info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 4:04AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with heavy rain will impact portions of north central Northampton, Greensville, northwestern Isle of Wight, Southampton, Sussex, southeastern Dinwiddie and central Surry Counties and the City of Emporia through 500 AM EDT... At 403 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ivor to near Seaboard. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Reduced visibility and minor flooding of poor drainage and low lying areas. Locations impacted include... Emporia, Waverly, Courtland, Garysburg, Wakefield, Surry, Dahlia, Purdy, Sussex, Gaston, Jarratt, Seaboard, Ivor, Dendron, Stony Creek, Elberon, Green Plain, Homeville, Sedley and Radium. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
